snippet: Ryan Lochte broke his own world record in the 200-meter individual medley Friday at the short-course world championships in Istanbul, and he celebrated by giving his gold medal to a boy in the crowd.
abstract: Ryan Lochte wins the 200-meter individual medley at the world short-course swimming championships in record 1 minute 49.63 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Lochte broke his own world record in the 200-meter individual medley Friday at the short-course world championships in Istanbul, and he celebrated by giving his gold medal to a boy in the crowd.

headline.main: Lochte Breaks Own Medley World Record
